sect1.title: Further Information
sect1.para: RCE is published under the Eclipse Public Licence (EPL) 1.0.
RCE is built upon the OSGi implementation Equinox. It is based on Eclipse 3.6 (Helios) and requires a Java Runtime Engine, version 7.

RCE packages are provided for Windows (32 and 64 bit) and Linux (32 and 64 bit). RCE is tested on Windows 7 (64 bit) and Ubuntu 12 and 14 LTS (64 bit). It is also reported to run on SLED 11 (64 bit). Other builds (especially Windows 32 bit) are provided as-is, with no formal testing.
For download and contact information, please visit www.rcenvironment.de
